body_html:
A simple workaround is to set WITH_SYSTEM_NCCL to False to force compile with provided NCCL. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L74

After modifying this, I can compile PyTorch without error.

body:
A simple workaround is to set `WITH_SYSTEM_NCCL` to `False` to force compile with provided NCCL. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/setup_helpers/nccl.py#L74

After modifying this, I can compile PyTorch without error.
